archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0975
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Billing Specialist, I require the ability to add service or plan from any date (future dating and backdating) so that we can cater for contract resigns

properties.value: Which currency should be presented during selling process? Horizon 2 requirement. Requirement need to be discussed in dedicated workshop session

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
